human development has become taboo. But that does absolutely nothing
to prove that rape is really wrong. On the atheistic view, there’s nothing
really wrong with your raping someone. Thus, without God there is no
absolute right and wrong which imposes itself on our conscience.
But the problem is that objective moral values do exist, and deep down we
all know it. There’s no more reason to deny the objective reality of moral val-
ues than the objective reality of the physical world. Actions like
